00042 Twist2D::Twist2D() : x(0), y(0), theta(0) {
00043 
00044 }

00046 Twist2D::Twist2D(float x, float y, float theta) : x(x), y(y), theta(theta) {
00047 }

00049 Twist2D::Twist2D(const Twist2D& orig) : x(orig.getX()), y(orig.getY()), theta(orig.getTheta()) {
00050 }

00053 }

00055 const Twist2D& Twist2D::operator=(const Twist2D& orig) {
00056     this->x = orig.getX();
00057     this->y = orig.getY();
00058     this->theta = orig.getTheta();
00059     return *this;
00060 }

00087 Twist2D operator+(const Twist2D& op1, const Twist2D& op2) {
00088     Twist2D twist(op1.getX() + op2.getX(), op1.getY() + op2.getY(), op1.getTheta() + op2.getTheta());
00089     
00090     return twist;
